Package index

All functions

batch_pval_plotter()
This function allows you to plot batch p-values of explained variation
combineExperiments()
Combines all of the downloaded datasets into a single summarized experiment object
combine_objects()
Merge samples with common gene names from selected studies
covariate_pval_plotter()
Covariate P-value Plotter This function allows you to plot covariate p-values of explained variation
DE_analyze()
Differential Expression Analysis
.select_assay()
Select assay based on input list type
pval_summary()
Returns summary table for p-values of explained variation
runTBsigProfilerFunction()
Runs the TBSignatureProfiler using selected datasets, profiles, and assays
run_curatedTBExplorer()
Run curatedTBExplorer app
toSE()
Converts MultiAssayExperiment to SummarizedExperiment Object
update_genenames()
Renames Genes Names In a List
update_gene_symbol()
Update gene names from input data
